title: Himi 423
lyrics:
7.6.7.6. loua
1.
Fanongo ki he tangi
‘A si’i ‘Initia,
Mo Siaina tokolahi,
Kae fonu malaʻia.
Fanongo ē, fanongo,
He kole ‘oku fai
Ki Tonga monū’ia,
“Kāinga, ‘ofa mai!”
2.
Ko ‘Afilika ‘ena,
Mo hono fu’u kakai;
Tutu ‘a e ngaahi kolo
Mo taki pōpula’i.
Fanongo ē, fanongo,
He kole ‘oku fai
Ki Tonga monū’ia,
“Kāinga, ‘ofa mai!”
3.
Ko ‘Otu Solomone
Masiva he lelei:
Ko Siava mo Neu Kini,
Mongoli mo Malei.
Fanongo ē, fanongo,
He kole ‘oku fai
Ki Tonga monū’ia,
“Kāinga, ‘ofa mai!”
4.
Tangi he kau fefine,
He fakamālohia;
Tangi ‘a si’i tamaiki,
He nofo ilifia:
Ko e kakai mo’ua
He lotu fakapō:
He feilaulau tangata,
He fale tevolo.
5.
Pea te tau tofanga
‘I ha lelei pehē,
Kae tuku ta’etokanga
He kāinga ‘oku hē?
‘Oku tau ma’u ha maama:
‘Oku tau ma’u ‘Otua;
Kae mate kinautolu
He mate ‘angaua.
6.
Oku nau fāfā atu
He hala ta’e’iloa,
Ta’e hanau tūhulu,
Poʻuli pē kotoa.
‘Oku nau ngalo hifo,
‘Oku nau ‘efihia,
‘I he pupu’a mate,
He hakau malaʻia.
7.
Te tau fehulunaki?
Te tau nonofo noa?
Mo fakaongotuli
Heʻenau fākafoa?
‘Oku tau kaungā toto,
‘Oku tau kaungā hia,
Mo kaungā ‘amanaki.
Mo kaungā malaʻia.
8.
Tau ‘oho ‘o hamusi,
Tau lī ha maea ē:
Foaki ‘etau pa’anga,
Mo toutou lotu pē.
Na’a hoko mai he ‘aho,
He ‘aho he ‘Otua,
‘O ‘eke ‘e he ‘Eiki,
“Koma’ā ho tokoua?” *
